description: wallpaper ecommerce site # Project Requirements ​ * Use React for the front end. ​ * Use GraphQL with a Node.js and Express.js server. ​ * Use MongoDB and the Mongoose ODM for the database. ​ * Use queries and mutations for retrieving, adding, updating, and deleting data. ​ * Be deployed using Heroku (with data). ​ * Meet the minimum requirements of a PWA: ​ 	* Uses a web manifest
